# Generated by xtables-save v1.8.2 on Sat Jul 10 12:30:12 2021
*filter
:INPUT ACCEPT [0:0]
:FORWARD DROP [0:0]
:OUTPUT ACCEPT [0:0]
-A FORWARD -s 10.0.0.0/20 -d 10.0.0.1/32 -p tcp --dport 80 -j ACCEPT
-A FORWARD -s 10.0.0.0/20 -d 10.0.0.1/32 -p tcp --dport 443 -j ACCEPT
COMMIT
# Completed on Sat Jul 10 12:30:12 2021
# Generated by xtables-save v1.8.2 on Sat Jul 10 12:30:12 2021
*nat
:PREROUTING ACCEPT [0:0]
:INPUT ACCEPT [0:0]
:POSTROUTING ACCEPT [0:0]
:OUTPUT ACCEPT [0:0]
-A PREROUTING -s 10.0.0.0/20 -p tcp --dport 80 -j DNAT --to-destination 10.0.0.1:80
-A PREROUTING -s 10.0.0.0/20 -p tcp --dport 443 -j DNAT --to-destination 10.0.0.1:443
-A POSTROUTING -j MASQUERADE
COMMIT
# Completed on Sat Jul 10 12:30:12 2021
